game.name: PAYDAY 2: Gage Mod Courier
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Gage Mod Courier DLC is the sixth DLC for PAYDAY 2. It allows players to act as a courier for Gage the arms dealer, picking up packages containing mods that are scattered all over D.C. The DLC introduces no less than 28 new weapon modifications for the player to tinker with.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Gage Mod Courier DLC is the sixth DLC for PAYDAY 2. It allows players to act as a courier for Gage the arms dealer, picking up packages containing mods that are scattered all over D.C. The DLC introduces no less than 28 new weapon modifications for the player to tinker with.
